events.message: I received the wrong size of the item I ordered and would like to return it. Please advise on the refund process as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to their request for returning an incorrect item and obtaining a money back.
Support agent James has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong size item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m James from customer support. I’m sorry about the issue with your order. Let me help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the item size you received so I can initiate the refund procedure?
My order number is 123456789, and I received a medium instead of the large size I ordered. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will send a prepaid return label shortly. Once we receive the returned item, we will process your refund immediately.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response. I’ll wait for the return label and send back the item promptly.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to ship the incorrect item back. Your refund will be processed upon receipt of the return.
Just following up to see if you have shipped the item back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the item yesterday using the label provided. Please confirm when the refund is processed.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our support regarding your refund case.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey and rated the resolution experience as positive and efficient.
The refund case has been formally closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
